title: Institutes Of Hotel Management (IHMS) & hospitality groups  sign MoUs
description: Central Institutes of Hotel Management under the Ministry of Tourism, Government of India, signed MoUs with eight leading hospitality groups on World Tourism Day. These partnerships aim to enhance student engagement, faculty development, and institutional growth in the hospitality sector. The initiative seeks to globalize Indian hospitality and skills.
